attributes.action: Honour Sarah Kennedy MBE  with a Dame Hood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Miss Sarah Kennedy has for 15 years been boardcasting on Radio 2 on the Dawn Patrol, a show with a strong loyal following whose listeners enjoy her sharp observations on life and witty banter.She rightly deserves recognition for her services to Tv and Radio over a long period of time. A Dame Hood would be a fitting tribute to a much loved broadcaster.
